attributes.additional_details: This petition is to get justice for 2 people who both recieved 12 years jail sentence for section 18 joint entrrprise when a burgler claims they hit her. No evidence or anything to support these claims and also the bugler tried black mailing  for £1000 to drop  section 18 charges something need to be done to get these both home with there family. Where is the justice in this. How can two people be jailed on a crimals say so.  She is also well know to the police..

rejection.details: What exactly do you want the Ministry to do? If you would like the sentence to be reviewed, please contact the Attorney General's Office.
